all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And they said one to another, Did not our heart burn within us, while he talked with us by the way, and while he opened to us the scriptures?
Luke 24:32
Quote of the Day
"Just like our Heavenly Father, Jesus Christ is perfectly merciful and just."
Elder John A. McCune | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
